Product Information
Code: RDR0127
Artist: Danny Gill
Media: DVD
Video Format: PAL + NTSC 
Product Genres: Rock, Metal, Technique
Skill Level: Intermediate To Advanced
Product Groups: DVD Tuition, Lick DVD's, Backing Track Tutorials

In Rock and Metal Runs Danny will teach you over 40 runs using all of the classic techniques used in rock and metal: bends, pull-offs, hammer-ons, sweep picking, 2 hand tapping, slides, vibrato and more. 

Each idea is played in context with a backing track and then demonstrated slowly with full explanations on the scales and techniques used. These melodic phrases will help you to solo over the entire length of the fretboard in a variety of rock and metal situations.
